column3: Ace-Snake-Eyes Call anyone snake eyes in the game. No one can look at the person with snake eyes until another ace is picked or they have a drink
Two-You Drawing player picks a person from the circle who has to sip
Three-Me Drawing player has to sip!
Four-Whores All girls have a sip
Bust-A-Jive Pick a dance move. The next person has to do that dance move and add to it. This continues until someone screws up and must sip
Six-Dicks All the guys have a sip
Seven-Heaven All players point a finger to the sky.Last player to do must sip
Eight-Mate Pick a mate. Whenever you drink they must sip
Nine-Rhyme Pick a word. Go around the circle with each person rhyming. First person to repeat a word or not have a word must sip.images/9heart.svg
Ten-Categories Pick a category.Go around the circle naming things in that category.First person to repeat or not answer must sip
Never-Have-I-Ever everybody puts up 3 to 5 fingers and drawing player says something they haven't done before and then go around the circle. The first person with all their fingers down must sip
Queen-Question-Master Whenever you ask a question to someone they must answer with a question or they sip
Kings-Cup Make a rule and whenever someone breaks that rule from now on they must sip
